name: Squid Game (itch) (pixelate-dev)
description:
Gamers who experience intense gaming experience risk their lives. Leaving even a small loophole may result in their death. There may be a big disaster and your game may end up there. The game is simple to play and does not require any special skills.

Enjoy the gameplay by following the directions the players provide. Make sure you avoid big damage by changing directions by moving left and right. A lack of efficiency in your movement may hinder you from winning the match.

Gameplay starts inside a confined area, requiring players to act cleverly in order to win. One wrong move can lead to death. Against the people stands a huge monster doll. When it looks toward people.

  • ⭕️Attention 👀 all players, the squid game is about to begin. 🦑🦑🦑🦑
    🔺Follow the staff’s instructions and swiftly make your way towards the game hall.
    🟥 Don't get eliminated 🙅‍♀️ and make your way to the top for the 💰 46.5 billion won💰 prize pool!!

    ---

    [ Games available ]
    - Red Light, Green Light
    - Sugar Honeycombs
    - Tug-of-war
    - Marbles
    - Glass Stepping Stones
    - The Squid Game

    Experience the thrills of the craze that's sweeping the world on your own mobile device!
